titleStmt.title: Mysterium religionis recognitum. An expedient for composing differences in religion. In certaine assertions and conclusions. / Presented to consideration.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy E.552[30]: "May 4th"; annotation of Thomason copy E.538[14]: "Jan: 15.". The 9 in the date is crossed out and replaced with "1648".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
